app.title: Arknights: Endfield Production Calculator
app.subtitle: Plan Your Factory
app.no_recipe_message: No production recipe found for this item.
app.meta_description: Free online production calculator for Arknights: Endfield. Plan your factory chains, calculate resource requirements, and optimize power consumption.
app.no_production_data: No production data available. Please calculate a production chain first.

help.title: How to Use
steps: Click the 'Select Recipe' button on the left panel. In the modal window, find and select your desired end product.
Set your production target in the 'Target Speed' field. The production chain will be generated automatically.
To change a component's recipe, click the dropdown on its node and select an alternative. After making changes, click the 'Calculate' button to update all rates.
Use the tabs at the top to create, rename, and reorder multiple production plans. You can drag tabs to change their order.
Below the main controls, toggle display options like raw materials, energy, alternative recipes, and physics simulation. The total energy consumption is shown here.
To set global defaults, click the 'Default Recipes' button. This opens a window to choose preferred recipes for items with alternatives.
Drag nodes to rearrange the graph. Click and drag the background to pan, and scroll to zoom.
help.note: P.S. If you have some bugs try reload page with Ctrl+F5. If it doesn't work send issue to bilzebuba at Discord or Telegram.

delete_confirmation.title: Confirm Deletion
delete_confirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete "" and all its unique ingredient chains?
